body: On a recent Sunday morning, the 59th Street A train platform was busier than normal for a rainy weekend. Families and a stream of rain-drenched runners, fresh from the Central Park Father's Day race, were descending the stairs when they encountered a mysterious empty subway train that roared into the station, slowed and sped up again without taking
title: Memories in Transit, On the Nostalgia Train

body: NEEDLE-Louis. Of Hollywood, Fl. Formerly of Seagate-Brooklyn, N.Y. Passed away January 9, 2001. Predeceased by wife Syd Needle. Loving father of Fern Ziegler, grandfather of Melanie Ziegler Dempster and Eric Ziegler. Great grandfather of Susan Ziegler. Services Thursday, January 11, 2001, 10:30AM at Gutterman's Funeral Home, 98-60 Queens Boulevard,
title: Paid Notice: Deaths NEEDLE, LOUIS
